name: Cis-app
body:
### Welcome to CIS APP iPhone/iPad App for RVC CIS Division. see screenshots of app: http://bit.ly/rvccisapp How to test app: 1) If interested in beta testing please install below **UDID Tool** app to your iPhone/iPad * Download and install UDID Tool: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/udid-tool/id377602501?mt=8 * Run UDID Tool app and send UDID to: c.konkol@rockvalleycollege.edu * Wait for email from c.konkol@rockvalleycollege.edu before going to step 2. 2) Install & Test App **Download and install CIS App (iPhone/iPad)** * Install via Link: https://ota.io/emyoac * Install via Scan (Need [SCAN APP](http://bit.ly/scanappios) to scan QR Code) ![CISAPP](http://qr.kaywa.com/?l=1&s=4&d=http%3A%2F%2Fkaywa.me%2FVViF4) 3) Post Feedback/Issues * https://mycisapp.uservoice.com/ ### Items to test: * Does app open? * Can you navigate to pages? * Is screen layout easy to use? * What suggestions do you have on: * Text, layout, colors, videos, etc?
Hit Count:
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
